Package com.taursys.model.event

This package contains event related classes which are generated by models and value holders.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ContentChangeEvent ContentChangeEvent Indicates that the current contents of a value holder have changed.
ContentValueChangeEvent ContentValueChangeEvent indicates a change to a property or value of the contents of a ValueHolder.
ListContentChangeEvent ListContentChangeEvent Indicates that the current contents of a ListValueHolder have changed.
StructureChangeEvent StructureChangeEvent indicates that the structure of an object has changed.
 

Package com.taursys.model.event Description

This package contains event related classes which are generated by models and value holders. These events are primarily used with by the Mapper Swing components.

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
